longDescription:
# About the Project

Comprehensive documentation and templates for implementing Digital Product Passports aligned with CIRPASS-2 standards. These guides translate complex EU regulation into actionable implementation steps.

# Contents

- Technical architecture templates
- Data model examples
- Stakeholder journey maps
- Compliance checklists
- Integration patterns

# Impact

Public resource helping manufacturers understand and implement DPP requirements ahead of 2027 deadline.

title: 3D Viewer for ODPP
description: Interactive 3D product visualization for Digital Product Passports
longDescription:
# About the Project

An interactive 3D viewer component that integrates with the ODPP platform, allowing consumers and stakeholders to explore products visually while accessing passport data.

# Features

- WebGL-based 3D rendering
- Touch and mouse interaction
- Hotspot annotations
- Integration with DPP data

title: ActiFi AI Portfolio Advisor
description: Building an AI-powered portfolio management system with natural language interface for financial planning and investment decisions.
longDescription:
# About the Project

An AI-powered portfolio management system that combines natural language understanding with sophisticated financial analysis. Users can interact conversationally to get portfolio insights, rebalancing recommendations, and investment guidance.

# Features

- Natural language interface for portfolio queries
- Real-time portfolio analysis
- AI-driven investment recommendations
- Multi-asset class support
